item.description:
Join us for Stump Team Trivia at Cafe Italiano in Hopkinton. This restaurant/bar has good food and is only about 3 minutes off Rt. 495 at Exit 21B. It is very close to EMC HQ. Stump team trivia is always lots of fun- so join us for a fun night with friendly people and good food.

We will meet at 7:30. Trivia is played in the bar area. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000. Everyone pays for their own food/drinks.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near bar. If necessary, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Stump Team Trivia at Cafe Italiano, Hopkinton
